text: @tariqnasheed Bc it is racist&incites hatred&division!An American teenager in Florida doesn’t deserve the stigma of this xenophobic label.Disease is coronavirus disease(COVID-19).Virus is severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2(SARS-CoV-2).Get it right! https://t.co/0UJifmafqv
